categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide fiction

nodes.text: The Ganjuko Graveyard is a roleplaying adventure outline in the September 1996 Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide, published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game as part of the Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire multimedia project. The adventure sends a team of Rebel Alliance operatives to the planet Kothlis to check out rumors of a ganjuko graveyard said to offer wondrous wealth and spiritual guidance, but the Rebels soon find they have been lured into a trap by a cunning Imperial Intelligence agent.
